page.title: 17HEALTH
page.content: There is a new Health Centre in Havant near the leisure centre.There are six practices in the building.Doctors have moved from their areas to join with other doctors.The Health Centre is a bigger and better place.Although most of the dentists have moved to the new building,one or two still remain in thier old buildings.Havant War Memorial is a medical hospital which involves medical care and support. Havant Day Hospital is a day hospital for people who need help with mental illness.Serious illnesses are treated at the hospitals in Portsmouth,St. Marys and Queen Alexander Hospitals. There are three main chemists in Havant,they are: Boots, Davies the chemists and Share Drug stores.There is also a health food shop in Havant called Natures Way.
